data.memo:
## Your Creative AI Partner!

Team up with your AI assistant to build stunning visual graphs. Follow the steps below! üöÄ

# Step 1: Onboard Your AI ü§ñ

## What to Do

1. Look at the toolbar at the top
2. Click the **üìã Onboard LLM** button
   - It's the **FIRST button on the far left**
3. The onboarding text copies to your clipboard
4. Open your AI chat (ChatGPT, Claude, Grok, etc.)
5. **Paste** the text and hit Enter

## Why This Matters

This teaches your AI how to create graphs in the exact format this app understands. You only need to do this once per chat session!

**This is a markdown node** - notice how it displays rich formatted text directly on the canvas!

# Step 2: Ask Your AI üí¨

## Tell Your AI What You Want

Now that your AI knows how to make graphs, just describe what you want:

### Good Examples:

- *"Create a graph about planets in our solar system"*
- *"Make a flowchart showing how to brew coffee"*
- *"Build an org chart for a startup"*
- *"Show me the water cycle as a graph"*

## What Happens

Your AI will respond with JSON code - a bunch of text with curly braces. **Copy all of it!**

Don't worry if it looks complicated - you don't need to understand it.

# Step 3: Paste & Create! ‚ú®

## Bring Your Graph to Life

1. **Copy** the JSON your AI created (Ctrl+C or Cmd+C)
2. Click anywhere on this canvas
3. Press **Ctrl+V** (or **Cmd+V** on Mac)
   - *Or click the **üìã Paste** button (2nd from left in toolbar)*
4. **BOOM!** Your graph appears instantly!

## What's Next?

- **Don't like something?** Tell your AI to change it
- **Want more?** Ask your AI to add more nodes
- **Made a mistake?** Press **Ctrl+Z** to undo

### Pro Tip

You can iterate as many times as you want. Just keep asking your AI to modify, add, or improve!

# üí° Copy These to Try!

## For Your AI

Copy any of these and paste them into your AI chat:

### Example 1: Simple Start
```
Create a graph about the solar system with the sun 
in the center and 4 planets around it. Use colors!
```

### Example 2: Workflow
```
Create a flowchart showing the steps to make 
the perfect cup of coffee, from grinding beans 
to the first sip.
```

### Example 3: Learning
```
Create a graph explaining photosynthesis with 
markdown nodes showing detailed explanations.
```

**Just copy one, paste it to your AI, then paste the result here!**
Made a mistake? Press Ctrl+Z (or Cmd+Z on Mac) to undo. You can undo multiple times!
Click the Save button (11th from left) to download your graph. The browser doesn't auto-save!
Select a node and press Delete key (or click the Delete button, 9th from left)
Want to start fresh? Click the Clear Graph button (10th from left) to delete everything
Drag empty space to pan. Use scroll wheel to zoom in/out. Middle-click drag also pans!
Ask your AI to use colors or gradients to make nodes pop! Notice the gradients in this graph?
Markdown nodes (like the 3 steps above) display formatted text. Perfect for documentation!
Group related nodes together to organize complex graphs. See the groups around this graph?
Keep asking your AI to improve, add, or modify. You can paste updates without starting over!

# üéØ You're Ready to Create!

## Quick Recap

1. Click **üìã Onboard LLM** (first button, far left)
2. Paste into your AI chat
3. Ask your AI to create a graph
4. Copy the JSON and press **Ctrl+V** here

## Next Steps

- Try one of the examples above ‚òùÔ∏è
- Or ask your AI about YOUR interests
- Save your work with **üíæ Save** (11th button)
- Delete this intro graph anytime with **üëé Clear Graph** (10th button)

### Have Fun! üöÄ‚ú®
Look at the top of your screen - that's where all the buttons are! The toolbar can be dragged around too.
The **üìñ Copy Manual** button (5th from left) copies the full user manual to your clipboard!
